00094 class EGS_TRACK_SCORING_EXPORT EGS_TrackScoring : public EGS_AusgabObject {
00095 
00096 public:
00097 
00098     EGS_TrackScoring(const string &Name="", EGS_ObjectFactory *f = 0);
00099 
00100     ~EGS_TrackScoring();
00101 
00102     int processEvent(EGS_Application::AusgabCall iarg) {
00103         if (m_score) {
00104             if (!m_didScore) {
00105                 m_didScore = true;
00106                 ++m_nScore;
00107             }
00108             int np = app->Np;
00109             if (m_pts->isScoringParticle(np)) {
00110                 if (iarg == EGS_Application::AfterTransport) {
00111                     m_pts->addVertex(np,new EGS_ParticleTrack::Vertex(app->top_p.x,app->top_p.E));
00112                 }
00113                 else if (iarg != EGS_Application::BeforeTransport) {
00114                     m_pts->stopScoringParticle(np);
00115                 }
00116             }
00117             else if (iarg == EGS_Application::BeforeTransport) {
00118                 int q = app->top_p.q;
00119                 if ((q ==  0 && m_score_photons) ||
00120                         (q == -1 && m_score_electrons) ||
00121                         (q ==  1 && m_score_positrons)) {
00122                     m_pts->startNewTrack(np);
00123                     m_pts->setCurrentParticleInfo(new EGS_ParticleTrack::ParticleInfo(q));
00124                     m_pts->addVertex(np,new EGS_ParticleTrack::Vertex(app->top_p.x,app->top_p.E));
00125                 }
00126             }
00127         }
00128         return 0;
00129     };
00130 
00131     bool needsCall(EGS_Application::AusgabCall iarg) const {
00132         return true;
00133     };
00134 
00135     void setApplication(EGS_Application *App);
00136 
00137     void reportResults();
00138 
00139     void setCurrentCase(EGS_I64 ncase) {
00140         if (ncase != m_lastCase) {
00141             m_lastCase = ncase;
00142             m_didScore = false;
00143         }
00144         if (ncase < m_start || ncase > m_stop) {
00145             m_score = false;
00146         }
00147         else {
00148             m_score = true;
00149         }
00150     };
00151 
00152     void setScorePhotons(bool score)   {
00153         m_score_photons = score;
00154     };
00155     void setScoreElectrons(bool score) {
00156         m_score_electrons = score;
00157     };
00158     void setScorePositrons(bool score) {
00159         m_score_positrons = score;
00160     };
00161     void setFirstEvent(EGS_I64 first)  {
00162         m_start = first;
00163     };
00164     void setLastEvent(EGS_I64 last)    {
00165         m_stop = last;
00166     };
00167     void setBufferSize(int size)       {
00168         m_bufSize = size;
00169     };
00170     void setFileNameExtra(const string &extra) {
00171         m_fnExtra = extra;
00172     };
00173 
00174 protected:
00175 
00176     EGS_ParticleTrackContainer  *m_pts;               
00177 
00178     EGS_I64                     m_start;              
00179     EGS_I64                     m_stop;               
00180     EGS_I64                     m_lastCase;           
00181     EGS_I64                     m_nScore;             
00182 
00183     int                         m_bufSize;            
00184 
00185     bool                        m_score;              
00186     bool                        m_didScore;           
00187 
00188     bool                        m_score_photons;      
00189     bool                        m_score_electrons;    
00190     bool                        m_score_positrons;    
00191 
00192     string                      m_fnExtra;            
00193 
00194 };
